title: DPS BestOf
itunes:title: DPS BestOf
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to the Commissioner of the NBA Adam Silver about expansion and load management. Mel Kiper Jr. calls in to discuss how many QBs he projects will go in the 1st round of the NFL Draft. And actor John C. Reilly tells us about portraying Dr. Jerry Buss in the new HBO documentary about the Showtime Lakers. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
